description: The use of agrodrones in comparison with heavy equipment allows not to compact the soil and to carry out point treatments even in hard-to-reach areas of the field.

advantageList.text: No cost for heavy machinery and labor

description: The augers create vertical airflow that ensures uniform application and prevents the formulation from rolling off the sheet. Thus making an even distribution.

advantageList.text: The size of the drop is 60-80 microns
Work on wet soils after rain

description: We provide field spraying services throughout Ukraine. When processing large areas, we will provide several groups that will quickly carry out the work.

advantageList.text: Processing speed 80-100 hectares / shift or 10-12 hectares / hour
